steps.text: In a food processor, combine the avocado, chickpeas, garlic, tahini, lemon juice, and olive oil. Blend until smooth.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Transfer the hummus to a serving bowl and drizzle with olive oil. Sprinkle with paprika and sesame seeds if desired.
Serve with pita bread, veggie sticks, or crackers. Enjoy your delicious vegan avocado hummus!
